name: Axle Health
headline: Scheduling and workforce management SaaS for home healthcare providers
description: Axle Health provides scheduling and workforce management software for home healthcare providers. The Axle platform includes a mobile app for clinicians, an operations dashboard for office teams, proprietary logistics algorithms to optimize scheduling, and a patient engagement and booking solution. Axle is integrated with a wide range of EMRs, and the entire Axle product can be customized and accessed modularly via API. Some of the biggest home health care providers in the country use Axleâ€™s software to improve the utilization of their clinical teams, and automate the operational burden of scheduling and dispatching.

founders.name: Adam Stansell, Founder
founders.description: CEO of Axle Health. Ex-Uber, Motive (fka KeepTruckin), management consulting, investment banking. Columbia BA summa cum laude in Econ-Math. Born and raised in Seattle, WA, also lived in Cambodia, Mexico and Argentina. GIF not JIF ðŸ™‚

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6031e83e39bee7b40a789c88/660ed40dd9a601a4e77e8b07_city-block-logo.png)

Adam Weinstein
Chief Product Officer
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6031e83e39bee7b40a789c88/660b1820d335a303d0d9d1f2_imagine-logo-big-final.svg)
Axle has been great in helping us manage our in-home clinical team. Set up is quick, platform is very easy to use, and customer support has been excellent and responsive. Has all the functionality we were looking for, and they're constantly rolling out new features and integrations. Overall strongly recommend.
Rachel Zartman
VP, Health Services

# Enterprise Grade Security and Compliance
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6031e83e39bee7b40a789c88/6578b419343e705e75ca8c73_Diploma.svg)
SOC 2 Certified
Axle is SOC-2 Type II certified, as verified by independent audit based on standards set by the AICPA
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6031e83e39bee7b40a789c88/6578b72975eab4a06d4e2b8b_Requirements.png)
HIPAA Compliant
Axle is fully HIPAA compliant, as verified by independent audit based on standards set by the HHS
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6031e83e39bee7b40a789c88/6578b73711168857d33cfe15_Lock.png)
SSO/SAML Auth
Axle supports 20+ IdPs (Google, Okta, etc) so you can authenticate using your SSO/SAML provider
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6031e83e39bee7b40a789c88/6578b7483a9f78c399a53bac_Approval.png)
Penetration Tested
Axle undergoes regular penetration testing by an independent security research firm
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6031e83e39bee7b40a789c88/6578b759ae497d99ed9f4c6b_Password%20Key.png)
Data Encryption
Axle encrypts all data in our platform in transit and at rest, using best in class encryption techniques
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6031e83e39bee7b40a789c88/6578b8081a3b9eb4da8fdad1_Access.png)
Access Controls
Axle provides fine-grained role types and permissions to ensure users have the appropriate levels of access
[View our Security Portal![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6031e83e39bee7b40a789c88/6578a1723a6e2e278b0e68ca_Forward.svg)](https://www.axlehealth.com/<https:/security.axlehealth.com/>)
# Managed by Axle
Use our network of clinicians to offer in-home services to your patients. You bring the program requirements, we bring the rest: supplies, scheduling, clinician staffing, and real-time operations to tie it all together.
[Explore Managed by Axle![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6031e83e39bee7b40a789c88/6578a1723a6e2e278b0e68ca_Forward.svg)](https://www.axlehealth.com/</managed-by-axle>)

generated_description:
**Axle Health** is a startup founded in 2020, nestled in the heart of Los Angeles, CA, and is part of the Y Combinator Batch W21. The company has developed a robust SaaS platform aimed at addressing some of the most pressing challenges faced by home healthcare providers. 

### Mission and Services

Axle Healthâ€™s mission is straightforward: enhance scheduling and workforce management for home healthcare providers. They understand that efficient scheduling can make or break home health operations. The Axle platform consists of a mobile app designed for clinicians, an operations dashboard for office teams, and proprietary algorithms that optimize scheduling. Additionally, they offer comprehensive patient engagement and booking solutions. Importantly, Axleâ€™s system is integrated with a vast array of Electronic Medical Records (EMRs), enabling a seamless workflow for its users.

### Product Features

- **Route Optimization**: Using advanced logistics algorithms, Axle increases clinician efficiency and reduces downtime.
- **Advanced Analytics**: The platform provides tools for predictive forecasting, real-time location tracking, and custom reporting, allowing organizations to make data-driven decisions.
- **Patient Engagement**: The solution enhances patient experience by improving appointment show rates through better scheduling and automated messaging.
- **Comprehensive Integrations**: Supports integration with various EMRs, CRMs, and HR systems, which can be tailored to fit specific needs.

### Impact and Achievements

Axle Health has made significant strides in its initial years. Their platform boasts impressive metrics, including a 19% increase in clinician productivity, a 55% reduction in patient no-show rates, and a staggering 71% decrease in time spent on operations. This level of impact is what makes them an attractive option for major home healthcare providers across the nation.

### Security and Compliance

Security is a critical consideration, especially in healthcare. Axle is SOC 2 Type II certified, HIPAA compliant, and supports various authentication methods. They also engage in routine penetration testing to safeguard data integrity.

### Team and Vision

Axle Health consists of a tight-knit team of eight, strategically led within the healthcare tech space by Group Partner Michael Seibel. The company proposes not just a technological solution but aims to redefine how home health care operates, making it more efficient and patient-centric.

If you're interested in learning more or exploring their offerings, take a look at their website: [Axle Health](https://www.axlehealth.com). 

In summary, Axle Health is a promising player in the healthcare SaaS arena, poised to make a meaningful impact on home healthcare through its intelligent scheduling and management solutions.
